utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay! This is it! We're gonna get married!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you sure you wanna do this?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, hello, Mrs. Ross!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, hello, Mr. Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wait! Okay!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Whoa!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on Pheebs! Hurry! Hurry! Hurry! Hurry!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay! Okay! Okay!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God!! Is everybody getting married?!!

utterance.speaker: Attendant
utterance.content: N-No running in the chapel!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! Don’t you give me any of your—Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you guys doing here?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ross and Rachel left us a message saying they were getting married! Isn’t that why you guys are here?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes! Well that-yes.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why else would we be here?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well! What happened?! Did we miss it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We actually missed it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, maybe you wouldn’t have had you run in the chapel!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is insane!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What’s the big deal, y’know? It’s not like it’s a real marriage.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, if you get married in Vegas, you’re only married in Vegas.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you talking about? If you get married in Vegas you’re married everywhere.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God!—Eh! Well…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why are we in bed together?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t know. Do-do you have any clothes on?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! But we-we didn’t have…sex-uh, did we? I mean, I don’t remember much about last night, it was such a blur.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! I remember laughing! I laughed a lot.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And we didn’t have sex.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, I mean, we were really drunk. I’m just glad we didn’t do anything stupid.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Tell me about it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Mornin’ Pheebs. Well, my movie has officially been canceled.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh Joey, I’m so sorry. You want some of my breakfast?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nah, I’m too depressed to eat. I’ll probably eat in like 5 minutes. So I guess I’ll just fly home with you guys, what time’s your flight?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What about my cab?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t need that anymore.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, Joey! You borrowed my cab; you have to drive it back.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t want to drive all the way back by myself, I get so lonely. Oh—ooh! How about you come with me?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don’t know, it’s such a long trip.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It’ll be great! We-we could talk, and play games! Huh? This could be our chance to like renew our friendship.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are you asking me to have a frenaissance?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right. Although I don’t think we need one, I never stopped loving you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, has anyone talked to Dr. and Mrs. Geller yet?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Um-hmm, yeah. They left me a message; they should be here any minute.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Where is the waitress?! I’m starving!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It’s a buffet man.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, here’s where I win all my money back!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Listen, I gotta talk to you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure! What’s up?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica and I almost got married last night.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God! That’s huge! Wait a minute, why come I wasn’t invited? And who was going to be your best man? Don’t say, "Ross." Do not say, "Ross."

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, I just don’t think Monica and I are ready to get married yet! Y’know? I mean, I love her and everything but seeing Ross and Rachel coming out of that chapel was like a, like a wake-up call that Monica and I are moving so fast. Y’know? And, how do I tell her without crushing her?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh! Tell her she’s not marriage material.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Girls say it to me all the time! And believe me, if she’s anything like me, she’s just gonna be relieved.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How do I tell Chandler that it’s too soon. It’s gonna break his heart, he’s not gonna think that I don’t love him anymore.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well you don’t.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes I do!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Good! Good! I was just testing you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh hi! Hi! Y’know, we were just talking about bacon.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, we were talking about tennis. Tennis is more believable.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: The Girls
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are we gonna talk about what you guys did last night? Or…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t know. What do you mean last night? Nothing, nothing uh, happened last night.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-huh! Ross invited us all to watch.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rach! We weren’t gonna miss our friends getting married!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Who got married?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You did.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?! Hello! We didn’t get married.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, we didn’t get married! That’s ridiculous!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We-we-we—I remember being in a chapel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I—They would not let us get married when we were that drunk!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: They let you get married when you’re drunk! Most people who get married in Vegas are drunk!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hell, I’m drunk right now! What? I can’t have a mimosa with breakfast?! I’m on vacation!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you guys gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I guess we just find a divorce lawyer?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I think, I think, Ross already has one. Now, this one’s free, right? Because you paid for the first two, so the third one’s free.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Laugh it up, but the joke’s on you. Because we don’t need to get divorced, okay? We we’re just gonna get an annulment.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: An annulment? Ross! I don’t think surgery’s the answer here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh-oh, that’s your thing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You’re thing. You’re thing. Y’know? You’re the guy who gets divorced.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Oh yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No-no, that’s-that’s not my thing! I do not love getting divorced!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes you do! This is your third divorce! You love divorce so much you’re probably gonna marry it! Then it won’t work out and you’re gonna have to divorce it, divorcing guy. I’m so drunk.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So, what do you think we should do?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don’t know. But I-I-I know I love you!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know I love you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So where are we on the whole going back to the place where they have all the marriages thing? I love you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s a good question. Look umm, last night we let the dice decide. Maybe we should leave it up to fate again. I love you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, we don’t get married unless there’s a sign! Okay, so say uh, say you roll another eight then there’s a definite sign that we should get married.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, eight we get married, but 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 9, 10, 11, 12 we don’t get married.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sounds great.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Croupler
utterance.content: Coming in, we got a shooter! Money please.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ready?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ready!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come on eight.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, yes eight.

utterance.speaker: Croupler
utterance.content: Eight! Easy eight.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow! I can’t believe I actually rolled an eight.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That was so unlikely. Well, let’s get married! I guess.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait a minute. That wasn’t a hard eight! Last night I rolled a hard eight.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That’s right! It was the wrong kind of eight, no wedding! Damnit!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I wanted it so bad! Wanna go pack?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah. We’re doing the right thing, right?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh, of course we are! We left it up to fate. If we were supposed to get married there would be a clear-cut sign.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, you have 19 questions left. Use them wisely. Come on Joey! You can’t win if you don’t ask any QUESTIONS!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, you promised me a fun road trip! We’ve been on the road six hours and you’ve been asleep for five and a half! We are switching at the next rest stop and you are going to drive all the way back! That will be your punishment, you greedy sleeper!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right. All right.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! And until then you are going to sing to me because the radio’s broken and you are selfish but have a nice voice.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really? I don’t…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sing!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I wanna rock and roll all night!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Man, this is a long drive! Are my eyes open? No!

utterance.speaker: Hitchhiker
utterance.content: Morning!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, hubby!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. Yeah, actually um, I wanted to talk to you about that whole annulment thing?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m not going to do that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay! So, we’ll just stay married.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, exactly!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And I will make everyone call me Mrs. Geller!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow! This is so amazing. I uh, I really thought I’d have to talk you into this more.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, see now I’m scared because I don’t actually think you’re kidding.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m-I’m not kidding. Look I-I, I can’t have three failed marriages. I can’t. Okay? I-I am not gonna be that guy!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What-wh-what so we’ll just stay married forever?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, look, how is this gonna affect you? Really? I mean you fill some form out once and a while and instead of checking the box that says Ms you check the box that says Mrs.! It’s right next to it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, okay, I’m sorry. You’re right. Y’know what? We absolutely can stay married, because I was under the impression that the boxes were far away from each other. All right, look, just please, take a moment here and think about what you’re asking of me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m asking you to do me a favor.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You are asking me to be your wife!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And as my wife I think you should grant me this favor.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That kid really kicked me hard on the plane.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well you did pull his hair.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He took my snack!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m not getting into this again!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay! Oh God, y’know what? It’s really bad.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I told you not to walk. Here. There. Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This doesn’t mean anything, does it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How could you pick up a hitchhiker?! He could be a rape—, a rapist or a killer or something!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don’t you think I asked him that before he got in?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y’know what? I’m not talking to you! You go back to sleep! And you, are you a rapist?!

utterance.speaker: Hitchhiker
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Do you like car games?

utterance.speaker: Hitchhiker
utterance.content: Yeah, y’know the license plate game?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I love the license plate game!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh, I’ll play! I’ll play!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No-No! You need your sleep. Night-night! Shh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Listen, I know you wanted to talk to me, but I have an idea that may make you want to stay married. We register, and you get to keep all the presents!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! Ross, come on! No! Listen, look I thought a lot about how to tell you this and the bottom line, Ross, is we can not stay married.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don’t know if it’s true.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh b-b-but it is!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, okay, y’know what this is? This is a difference of opinion. And when that happens in a marriage...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Ross, come on! This is not, this is not a marriage!! This is the world’s worst hangover! Ross, listen, if you do not get this annulment, I will!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right. All right, I’ll do it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank you. Hey-hey umm, uh, is there, is there any such thing as an annulment shower?

utterance.speaker: Hitchhiker
utterance.content: Wait! Wait! There is the train station!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, okay.

utterance.speaker: Hitchhiker
utterance.content: This is where I get off. Well, I have your address and phone number.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And I have your name and the fact that you’re a drifter, so the ball’s pretty much in your court.

utterance.speaker: Hitchhiker
utterance.content: All right, see ya Pheebs.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on Pheebs! I can’t take this anymore! Let-let me make it up to you. Huh? Ground control to Major Tom. Commencing countdown, engines on. Take your protein pills and put your helmet on!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Stop it! Stop it no! That’s not fair! Y’know I can’t resist that beautiful voice!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Pheebs, I am so sorry! I know I promised you a fun road trip with your friend and I didn’t deliver. But-but-but now I know that you think being awake is an important part of friendship! So, so, so I will strive to-to stay awake for as long as I know you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You can still sleep at night and stuff.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, thank you. So, can we play 20 Questions now? I’ve got a really good one! I’ve been thinking about it since Kansas.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Is it a kind of hot sandwich?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Is it a meatball sub?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That is incredible! You are the master!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Huh, that’s funny. You look like you’re gonna be the…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, don’t say it! Don’t even think it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right. Okay Chandler, enjoy your handful.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, should we just, should we just get married? Y’know? I mean should we just do it? All the signs are telling us to do it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m sick of the signs! It’s too fast, I’m happy the way things are!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Me too!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don’t want things to change! Do you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right then, then nothing changes! Everything is great! Everything stays the same! And you go unpack because it’s been three days and it’s driving me insane!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Jeez, relax! It’s not like we’re mar-ah-ah!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know I was thinking, what if I uh, unpack here?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Then all your stuff would be here.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, what if all my stuff was here?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Then you’d be going back and forth all the time, I mean it doesn’t make any sense.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. What if we lived together and you understand what I’m saying?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Live together? There have been no signs for that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Me asking is kind of a sign.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay!!!!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes! Okay! Okay! Wait-wait-wait!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Here’s your key

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh thanks.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Here’s your key. All right, you have to christen it! Now, go out and come back in!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The door hasn’t been locked in five years, but okay! Ready?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ready!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, a little problem. The key broke in the lock and I can’t get in!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait! Oh my God! I can’t get out!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This is not a sign!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, it’s not a sign! It’s a very old key!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It’s an old key!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God it’s old!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I love you!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I love you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you hugging the door right now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah-yeah, me neither.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, so did everything go all right with the annulment?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, no problems. It’s all taken care of.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, thank you. Hey, do you guys wanna go see a movie?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh yeah, why not?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Pheebs?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No thanks, I’ve already seen one.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, umm, I’m gonna get my sweater.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. You uh, you wanna hear something weird?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Always.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I didn’t get the annulment.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We’re still married! Don’t tell Rachel. See you later.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The key’s stuck in the lock.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can fix it. Hold on. Look out. Look out.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It still doesn’t work.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m not finished.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nice job Joe! You’re quite the craftsmen.
